publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5601 Pauline McNeill: Congratulations to Habib Malik, Winner of the Robert Burns Humanitarian Award 2010—That the Parliament warmly congratulates Habib Malik, Scotland area manager of Islamic Relief and a member of the Disasters Emergency Committee, as the winner of the Robert Burns Humanitarian Award 2010; recognises his personal commitment as an aid worker who has dedicated his life to assisting those in need in many places around the world, including the Swat region of Pakistan, Kashmir, Bangladesh, Ethiopia, Somalia, Sudan, Niger, Afghanistan, Lebanon, Gaza, Pakistan and recently Haiti, and further recognises the good work of Islamic Relief across the world. Supported by: Joe FitzPatrick*, Bob Doris*, Elaine Smith*, James Kelly*, Elaine Murray*, Jim Hume*, Patricia Ferguson*, Margaret Curran*, Cathy Jamieson*, Brian Adam*, Bill Butler*, Bill Kidd*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Des McNulty*, Marlyn Glen*, Mary Mulligan*, Jackie Baillie*

S3M-5601 Congratulations to Habib Malik, Winner of the Robert Burns Humanitarian Award 2010 (lodged on 25 January 2010) Stuart McMillan*, Robin Harper*, Liam McArthur*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Jamie Hepburn*, Sandra White*, Trish Godman*
